pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-chi==========.. figure:: https://github.com/ChameleonCloud/python-chi/workflows/Unit%20tests/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/ChameleonCloud/python-chi/actions?query=workflow%3A%22Unit+tests%22``python-chi`` is a Python library that can help you interact with the`Chameleon testbed <https://www.chameleoncloud.org>`_ to improve yourworkflows with automation. It additionally pairs well with environments likeJupyter Notebooks.* `Documentation <https://python-chi.readthedocs.io>`_* `Contributing guide <./DEVELOPMENT.rst>`_
